DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study of Ceftaroline vs. Ceftriaxone in Adults With Community-Acquired Pneumonia
DOC.detailed_description: Clinical trials is being held in different countries. The purpose of the study is to determine if the antibiotic ceftaroline is safe and effective in the treatment of community-acquired pneumonia in adults.
